parameters.description: B-Field magnitude (average of fine scale field magnitudes)

parameters.name: flowSpeed
parameters.description: Proton flow speed

parameters.name: elevAngle
parameters.description: Proton flow elevation angle / latitude (RTN)

parameters.description: Proton flow azimuth angle / longitude (RTN)

parameters.description: Proton density
